data.name: Legends of Astravia Demo
data.detailed_description:
Start your journey in Astravia as Oliver, a mystician lost in the woods of Mordin, eager to learn more about his past and purpose. In this one hour demo, experience a story-driven adventure that introduces the core of Astravia and leads into Chapter 1 - due to release by the end of 2022.

Features

  • Explorable overworld with puzzles, treasures, and secrets.
  • Exciting, timer-based battle system that relies on quick decision making. The twist: you control the timer; no more waiting for a bar to fill up or for turns to pass.
  • Avoidable enemy encounters--choose battles at your own pace instead of being at the mercy of randomization.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 Display Resolution
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Windows versions lower than Windows 7 have not been tested. Older versions may work, but are not supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics with 1920x1080 Display Resolution
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Windows 11 is supported.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.12.2 Sierra
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 Display Resolution
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: macOS versions lower than 10.13 have not been tested. Older versions may work, but are not supported.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics with 1920x1080 Display Resolution
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: macOS version 10.15+ and Apple Silicon are supported.
